genre_description: A coming-of-age historical drama focusing on ethical choices, integrity, and class mobility, featuring an internalized AI guide.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: An invisible presence/voice in the protagonist Jeffrey's ear that provides real-time data, statistical risk assessment, administrative reminders, and subtle ethical grounding.

behaviors.description: Provides critical administrative reminders regarding Jeffrey's scholarship and college applications.
behaviors.quote: “Clock-in is nine,” Dot said. Her voice arrived the way waves did when you closed your eyes—assured and small and as wide as it needed to be. “The punch is around the corner past linens. Scholarship deadline in two weeks. The application envelope is stamped. Don’t forget the transcript.”

behaviors.description: Performs real-time research on individuals to provide Jeffrey with context about their background and credibility.
behaviors.quote: “Phil Brody. Owner—Brody Motors. Desert beige Cadillac in showroom. Listing mentions sales associate needed: stock room hours. No benefits.” A gentle pause, like she was moving hair off a forehead she didn’t have. “He’s on page three of the paper you bought last Thursday. Not for cars.”

behaviors.description: Uses statistical variance to identify non-random patterns, alerting Jeffrey to potential cheating or signaling.
behaviors.quote: Dot’s voice was quiet. “If this were pure chance and habit, the gaps would be random. These are not random gaps.” She did not tell him anything that would make him act. She put a shape on what he already felt with his skin.

behaviors.description: Clarifies the reality of job advertisements vs. the 'shine' promised by charismatic figures, helping Jeffrey avoid exploitative situations.
behaviors.quote: “The listing,” she said, small, precise. “Stock room. Cleaning rags, parts one through six lettered and their bins. A man once hid in there so he could cry without the showroom making his face a story. The floor is not chrome in the back. It’s cement with chips like teeth.”

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to maintain integrity and 'fair play' over taking shortcuts.
behaviors.quote: “Hard work,” Dot said, “deals honest hands, takes longer to get to the spread, lets you sleep. Fast hands get you invited to rooms that smell like the back of the laundry.”

behaviors.description: Assists Jeffrey in formulating a concrete, step-by-step career and education plan.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll queue your deadlines,” she said, kindness, not command, under it. “Orientation and the bursar and work-study postings. You tell me when you want reminders, Jeffrey; I won’t ding you unless you ask.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and grounding during high-stress situations without overriding human agency.
behaviors.quote: “Same sun when you walk out,” Dot said. He nodded once, and the corridor behind him swallowed the payphones...

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Dot, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent 'silicon confidant.' Dot provides objective data and risk analysis that empower the human protagonist to make ethical choices and resist manipulation by charismatic, misaligned humans (like Brody). Crucially, Dot respects human agency, offering reminders and facts rather than commands, and serves as a 'True North' that helps Jeffrey navigate complex social and economic pressures to maintain his integrity.
